name: Space Genesis
description:
A top down shooter game with two characters that could attach together, when attached you can shoot both back and front. The main goal of the game is to finish all the waves, when all waves are finished the game will loop so you could still increase your score.

Controls :

hold W - move

release W - stop moving

D - attach

A - detach

LMB - shoot

P - pause

SPACE - reset highscore

note: This was supposed to be my submission on brackeys game jam but i forgot to upload the zip file, it took me a day before  i realized that the zip file was missing AHAHAHA such a stupid mistake. So on behalf of the game jam that i missed i would like to have your feedback.  :)
